Our mission is to enable partners to build deep expertise and thriving business practices with Pivotal.
Accelerating Development
In May, we explored the theme of Accelerating Development across Pivotal’s editorial properties. In truth, the development process is rarely what needs to be accelerated. More likely, it is a combination of the entire stack of people, processes, and technology—everything from CI/CD pipelines to raising up the developers’ level of abstraction.
Here are some of the featured content from May exploring what makes developers more productive and accelerates development:
Blog
- To Speed Software Development, Use Build Pipelines. <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/to-speed-software-development-use-build-pipelines-then-use-concourse-dashboards-to-analyze-progress]]> Then Use Concourse Dashboards To Analyze Progress - From CD-ROMs to Continuous Delivery: A Look at Enterprise IT Evolution <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/from-cd-roms-to-continuous-delivery-a-look-at-enterprise-it-evolution]]>
Videos, Podcasts & Webinars
- How T-Mobile got the best of both worlds with TIBCO and Pivotal Cloud Foundry: Speed, Scale & Agility Delivered on Cloud Foundry Leveraging TIBCO <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5YpbuaVSX3Y]]> - Cloud-Native Fundamentals: Accelerating Development with Continuous Integration <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/may-17-cloud-native-fundamentals-accelerating-development-with-continuous-integration-webinar]]> - Crossing the Value Stream: Improving Development with Pivotal and Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/may-23-crossing-the-value-stream-improving-development-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry-webinar]]> - Debunking Myths about Cloud Portability <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/may-31-debunking-myths-about-cloud-portability-webinar]]>
Analyst Reports
- Beyond Speed: Enterprise CI/CD and DevOps <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/451-research-beyond-speed-cicd]]> from 451 Research
What’s coming up next month? Cloud-Native Data is the theme, so look out for blogs, podcasts, webinars and more that are focused on how data fits into the cloud-native picture. Here’s some previous content on this topic to help you join the discussion by publishing your own blog, podcast, or video:
- Cloud-Native Data: What is it? <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017/ytp-cloud-native-data-panel]]> - Why Accelerating Software Development in the Enterprise is a Team Sport <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/accelerating-software-development-in-the-enterprise-is-a-team-sport-ep-68]]> - Cloud-Native Data: What Data Questions to Ask When Building Cloud-Native Apps <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/mar-15-cloud-native-data-what-data-questions-to-ask-when-building-cloud-native-apps-webinar]]> - The State (Pun Intended) of Cloud-Native Data <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/the-state-pun-intended-of-cloud-native-data-ep-65]]>
Enablement
With the speed of development in this industry, it can sometimes feel hard to stay abreast of the latest and greatest. We’ve attempted to point out some of the best educational and enablement resources here.
Training Opportunities
- Platform Acceleration Labs: Pivotal’s 12-18 person immersive courses for Cloud-Native Developers and Architects <[[https://pivotal.io/platform-acceleration-lab]]>. Next open sessions are July 9-26 (Cloud-Native Architects) and Sept 10-13 (Cloud-Native Developers). - Visit the Partner Portal <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/?ReturnUrl=%2fEnglish%2fGlobal%2fdelivery%2flearning-path.aspx]]> for your specific learning path. - Register for our webinars <[[http://tracking.impartner.org/r/00B/236866/vmbavetxarq7iypgi5udqyy7xe]]> specifically built for partners. June 27: PRPP Town Hall - A Pivotal Partner Update - Interested in Greenplum training? Find it here <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/Global/delivery/working-with-data.aspx#updates]]>.
Product Updates
- Learn more about what Pivotal has learned from our customers and how we do Cloud-Native .NET The Right Way <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/pivotal-cloud-native-dotnet-the-right-way]]>. - Read about how PCF reduces risk <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/for-banks-securing-modern-apps-starts-with-identity-access-management-heres-how-pcf-helps-the-largest-firms-reduce-risk]]> when it comes to running modern apps at some of the largest banks in the world. - Learn more about PCF on-premise deployments options with Pivotal Ready Architecture <[[https://pivotal.io/pivotal-ready-architecture]]> and Azure Stack <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/hybrid-cloud-without-the-stress-pcf-on-azure-stack]]>. Both are available from Dell! - Version 5.8 of Pivotal Greenplum is now available <[[https://content.pivotal.io/greenplum-community/pivotal-greenplum-5-8-released]]>! - This last April, Pivotal was a Sponsor of the PostgresConf in New Jersey, which included a dedicated track called Greenplum Summit. Read all about it <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/postgres-conference-2018-greenplum-summit]]> on our blog, and watch the replays of all the action!
Marketing
Last month, we talked about embedding UberFlip content streams directly into your pages. This month we focus on upcoming events and taking advantage of the Pivotal Editorial Calendar.
Upcoming Events
- Register for SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/register]]> Sept. 24-27, Washington D.C. This is Pivotal’s premier customer event, which sold out in attendees and sponsorship in 2017. Here is the sponsorship prospectus <[[https://d1ophd2rlqbanb.cloudfront.net/2018/sponsors/SpringOne-Platform-2018-Prospectus.pdf]]>. - SpringOne Tour <[[https://springonetour.io/2018/sponsor]]>: Sponsorships still available on a per-city basis: SpringOne Tour is Pivotal’s multi-city roadshow running through the year.
BEST PRACTICE OF THE MONTH: Pivotal Editorial Calendar
The Pivotal Marketing team has put together a calendar of content themes that we’re using to organize content thematically throughout the year. While this doesn’t dictate all of the content we publish in a given month, the majority of our content is centered around the theme and sub-theme.
If you’re interested in coordinating on a joint piece of content, a great first step is to check out the themes calendar <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/Global/more/recordings.aspx]]> and see if that can act as inspiration for a piece of content.
Partner Spotlight
System Integrator // North America // Pivotal Cloud Foundry // PAL Graduate
Solstice enables the digital enterprise by helping the Fortune 500 reimagine their digital customer experiences and create new digital products on Pivotal Cloud Foundry. Solstice also equips companies with digital best practices in lean product management, human-centered design, agile delivery, and extreme programming.
Getting the Joint Story Out
Solstice showcases its experience and thought leadership around PCF and cloud-native concepts with a steady drumbeat of content. Here are a few highlights:
- A Technical Walkthrough to Get Your First Workload on PKS <[[https://www.solstice.com/blog/a-technical-walkthrough-to-get-your-first-workload-on-pks]]> - From CD-ROMs to Continuous Delivery: A Look at Enterprise IT Evolution <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/from-cd-roms-to-continuous-delivery-a-look-at-enterprise-it-evolution]]> - June 14: Running Data Platforms Like Products Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/jun-14-running-data-platforms-like-products-webinar]]>
Find more content from Solstice about working with Pivotal here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/solstice]]>.
Joint Case Study: Discover
Watch this recent interview <[[https://youtu.be/uKg8Z8rAI2c]]> with Sheila Lodhia, VP of Digital Development at Discover Financial to hear how they are modernizing their backend services with Solstice and Pivotal.
With cross-functional teams now aligned towards clear goals and backend services now modernized, the team is increasing its feature delivery rate and improving its iterative deployment rate.
“PCF has fundamentally changed the cloud conversation within our large enterprise clients. As a digital innovation consultancy, we not only find ourselves deeply aligned with the PCF platform, but with Pivotal’s philosophy and approach as well. We’re proud to be an Advanced Pivotal Partner and continue to scale our cloud-native practice to help our clients accelerate their cloud-native journeys.”
- Andrew Whiting VP, Business Development, Solstice
